name: The Whey of Tyromancy
description:
Edam the Tyromancer has been thrown into the Roquefort dungeon. Escape via platforming!

A short platformer, missing the ending. Arrow keys are all you need. Until I update the end, Alt+F4 once you reach outside. There is a secret inside the dungeon (not outside).

I'll upload the Linux & Mac builds once I finish it.

Credits: https://github.com/prime31/CharacterController2D For the entire character movement system & my brother for the all the audio and art.
